@@ -1,55 +0,0 @@
-SET XACT_ABORT ON;
-
-DECLARE @UpdateId NVARCHAR(100);
-SET @UpdateId = N'Update230221_AddDistrictSettingCategoryRTI_CW0575_78297';
-
-BEGIN TRANSACTION;
-
-INSERT INTO [iep].[Version]
-(
-    UpdateId
-)
-VALUES
-(@UpdateId);
-
-DECLARE @Author NVARCHAR(50) = N'CW0575_78297';
-DECLARE @Date DATETIME2 = GETDATE();
-DECLARE @DistrictSettingDefinitionId UniqueIdentifier = 'D4F817F5-8254-4764-83CE-9627032867D7'; --AllowCopyForward
-DECLARE @DistrictSettingCategoryId UniqueIdentifier = '0F7F0793-087B-4D0F-8D97-B962FDCA9505'; --RTI/MTSS
-
-IF NOT EXISTS
-(
-    SELECT *
-    FROM iep.DistrictSettingCategory
-    WHERE DistrictSettingCategoryId = @DistrictSettingCategoryId
-)
-BEGIN
-    INSERT INTO iep.DistrictSettingCategory
-    (
-        DistrictSettingCategoryId, DistrictSettingCategoryKey, Name, IsActive,
-        OrderNumber, ProgramType, CreatedBy, CreatedDate, UpdatedBy, UpdatedDate
-    )
-    VALUES
-    (   @DistrictSettingCategoryId,  'RTIMTSS',  'RTI/MTSS', 1,
-        38,   11,  @Author, @Date,  @Author,  @Date
-    );
-END;
-
-IF NOT EXISTS
-(
-    SELECT *
-    FROM iep.DistrictSettingCategoryDefinitionIndex
-    WHERE DistrictSettingCategoryId = @DistrictSettingCategoryId and DistrictSettingDefinitionId=@DistrictSettingDefinitionId
-)
-BEGIN
-    INSERT INTO iep.DistrictSettingCategoryDefinitionIndex
-    (
-        DistrictSettingCategoryId, DistrictSettingDefinitionId, CreatedBy, CreatedDate, UpdatedBy, UpdatedDate
-    )
-    VALUES
-    (   @DistrictSettingCategoryId,  @DistrictSettingDefinitionId,  @Author, @Date,  @Author,  @Date
-    );
-END;
-
-PRINT 'The database update succeeded.';
-COMMIT TRANSACTION;

+        /// <param name="formsIds">Form IDs.</param>
+        /// <param name="eventId">The event identifier.</param>

+        [HttpPost]

+            return Json(new { requiredForms = forms });
+        }
+

commits.Message:
https://frontlinetechnologies.atlassian.net/browse/CW0575-77912
Miami - CM241 - Add Florida Assessment of Student Thinking Assessments (FAST) to the Assessment RDI
commits.Author: Darya Semyonova

Files.name: Sources/Iep/Sources/Accelify.Iep.Database/StateMiami/UpdateScripts/Update230223_AddParentValueForFASTLookupValue.sql
Files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,69 @@
+SET XACT_ABORT ON;
+
+DECLARE @UpdateId NVARCHAR(100);
+SET @UpdateId = N'Update230223_AddParentValueForFASTLookupValue';
+
+BEGIN TRANSACTION;
+
+INSERT INTO iep.Version
+(
+    UpdateId
+)
+VALUES
+    (@UpdateId);
+
+DECLARE @Author NVARCHAR(50) = N'd.semyonova';
+DECLARE @Date DATETIME2 = GETDATE();
+
+IF NOT EXISTS
+(
+    SELECT 1
+    FROM iep.LookupValue
+    WHERE LookupValueId = 'AD77BFD6-CA49-48D4-B84C-7136C0D8112C'
+)
+   AND EXISTS
+(
+    SELECT 1
+    FROM iep.LookupValue
+    WHERE LookupValueId = '15BE45E3-CF4C-4132-902F-D57F5D5EC6C4'
+)
+    INSERT INTO iep.LookupValue
+    (
+        LookupValueId,
+        LookupValueParentId,
+        LookupTypeId,
+        Name,
+        Abbreviation,
+        OrderNumber,
+        IsActive,
+        CreatedBy,
+        CreatedDate,
+        UpdatedBy,
+        UpdatedDate,
+        CommonDistrictId,
+        ProgramType,
+        IsDisabled,
+        EnumValue,
+        Note
+    )
+    VALUES
+    (   'AD77BFD6-CA49-48D4-B84C-7136C0D8112C', -- LookupValueId - uniqueidentifier
+        '15BE45E3-CF4C-4132-902F-D57F5D5EC6C4', -- LookupValueParentId - uniqueidentifier
+        '9BD5698F-733D-4300-AFE5-6B7F9601D808', -- LookupTypeId - uniqueidentifier
+        N'Other',                               -- Name - nvarchar(1000)
+        N'Other',                               -- Abbreviation - nvarchar(50)
+        99,                                     -- OrderNumber - int
+        1,                                      -- IsActive - bit
+        @Author,                                -- CreatedBy - nvarchar(50)
+        @Date,                                  -- CreatedDate - datetime
+        @Author,                                -- UpdatedBy - nvarchar(50)
+        @Date,                                  -- UpdatedDate - datetime
+        NULL,                                   -- CommonDistrictId - int
+        NULL,                                   -- ProgramType - int
+        NULL,                                   -- IsDisabled - bit
+        NULL,                                   -- EnumValue - int
+        NULL                                    -- Note - nvarchar(max)
+        );
+
+PRINT 'The database update succeeded.';
+COMMIT TRANSACTION;
\ No newline at end of file
